INSTRUCTIONS.DESCRIPTION: This test evaluates your reaction time, coordination, and ability to respond correctly to visual and auditory stimuli, similar to tests used in driving aptitude assessments.

STEPS.SPEED: Start the test by selecting a speed (Slow, Medium, or Fast) and clicking the "Start" button.
STEPS.COLORS: When a colored circle appears in the top rows, press the corresponding color key.
STEPS.PEDALS: When one of the bottom circles (left or right) turns white, press the corresponding key.
STEPS.SOUNDS: When you hear a sound, press the key that matches the tone (deep or high).
STEPS.TIMING: You must respond to each signal before the next one appears.

GAME_CONTROLS.SPEED_NOT_SELECTED_ERROR: You need to select a speed, before you can start the test.

KEYBINDINGS.TITLE: Controls
KEYBINDINGS.PRESS_ANY_KEY: Press any key to set the keybinding for
